author: By BEN NADLER and JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Stay-home order could roll back some local restrictions
description: ATLANTA (AP) — A statewide stay-at-home order from Georgia's governor that was to go into effect Friday after weeks of resistance could actually loosen some restrictions that local officials had already put in place, such as park closures, the officials…
content:
ATLANTA (AP) A statewide stay-at-home order from Georgia's governor that was to go into effect Friday after weeks of resistance could actually loosen some restrictions that local officials had already put in place, such as park closures, the officials said.
